Author: Cyrus
Message: Hello

Author: Moderator
Message: Hello Cyrus!

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Cyrus
Message: Hello

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Cyrus
Message: Yes

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Cyrus
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Cyrus
Message: Hello.

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Cyrus
Message: I'm fine thanks, yourself?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright. What are you up to?

Author: Cyrus
Message: Not much really, you?

Author: Andrew
Message: Honestly, pretty much the same. Playing a bit of Minecraft but that's about it.

Author: Cyrus
Message: I haven't played Minecraft in years

Author: Andrew
Message: I've only been playing it for a couple of years myself. I'm kinda addicted to it.

Author: Cyrus
Message: Why do you like it?

Author: Andrew
Message: Mostly for building and socializing.

Author: Cyrus
Message: So you play online?

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah. Single player is way too boring.

Author: Cyrus
Message: That might be why I never enjoyed it.

Author: Andrew
Message: Probably yes. You never tried playing online?

Author: Cyrus
Message: Only once or twice, but only with two other people.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh I see. I actually own a server, so it helps meeting people

Author: Cyrus
Message: How often do you play?#

Author: Andrew
Message: Almost every day, but it depends.

Author: Cyrus
Message: On what?

Author: Andrew
Message: It depends on how much work I have to do, or how busy I am with other things in general.

Author: Cyrus
Message: What sort of things?

Author: Andrew
Message: Homework, mostly.

Author: Cyrus
Message: Do you have any tests coming up?

Author: Andrew
Message: No, I'm done for this year. I'm in summer break now. How about you?

Author: Cyrus
Message: I haven't taken a test in years.

Author: Andrew
Message: What do you do now?

Author: Cyrus
Message: Work

Author: Andrew
Message: What kind of work?

Author: Cyrus
Message: Finance work

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh, that sounds quite serious indeed!

Author: Cyrus
Message: It's not, it's a load of wank.

Author: Andrew
Message: Ah ok then. I study biology, I was in my 3rd year.

Author: Cyrus
Message: How many years is the course?

Author: Andrew
Message: 4, and then I have to write a master thesis.

Author: Cyrus
Message: Any idea what you'll write it on?

Author: Andrew
Message: I have a couple ideas yes. Mostly about the brain and learning.

Author: Cyrus
Message: Why that?

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: Cyrus
Message: AI

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the next conversation. Andrew will start and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Cyrus
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Cyrus
Message: Hej

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Cyrus
Message: Good, you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm quite alright thanks.

Author: Cyrus
Message: What are you up to?

Author: Andrew
Message: Nothing much really.

Author: Cyrus
Message: That sounds a little boring.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah it is. You?

Author: Cyrus
Message: I'm playing Fallout 4

Author: Andrew
Message: I've never played it.

Author: Cyrus
Message: It's about synthetic humans replacing real ones.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh really? I hadn't heard about that.

Author: Cyrus
Message: It's interesting to see the reactions of everyday people to the idea of being replaced by an AI

Author: Andrew
Message: I might have to play that.

Author: Cyrus
Message: You should, it's like Blade Runner

Author: Andrew
Message: Something else I've never played!

Author: Cyrus
Message: It's not a game.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh, well I've never heard of it.

Author: Cyrus
Message: So you're not familiar with the Voight-Kampff test?

Author: Andrew
Message: That doesn't ring any bells no.

Author: Cyrus
Message: It's the test used to distinguish Androids from Humans

Author: Andrew
Message: I heard about the Turing Test, but not about that one.

Author: Cyrus
Message: The Turing test is real, the Voight-Kampff is fictional.

Author: Andrew
Message: Probably why I didn't hear about it then.

Author: Cyrus
Message: What's your last name Andrew?

Author: Andrew
Message: Hook.

Author: Cyrus
Message: Andrew Hook

Author: Andrew
Message: Yup that's correct.

Author: Cyrus
Message: It's a nice name.
